alert.note: Alert for Lower Yampa River Basin; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus; San Juan River Basin; Upper Gunnison River Valley; Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 11 at 6:46PM MDT until April 12 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph. Expect gusts up to 55 mph in the valleys and up to 65 mph in the mountains. * WHERE...In Utah, Tavaputs Plateau and La Sal and Abajo Mountains. In Colorado, Upper Yampa River Basin, San Juan River Basin, Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus, Lower Yampa River Basin and Upper Gunnison River Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Lower Yampa River Basin; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus; San Juan River Basin; Upper Gunnison River Valley; Upper Yampa River Basin
